name: Brawling Heavies
description:
Local Versus Hybrid Fighting Game

The base concept for this game was to combine aspects of traditional fighting games, platform fighters and sprinkle in some concepts that tend to be used in RPGs such as damage numbers and a buff system.

There is no AI player implemented at this point, so you'll need to have 2 controllers and a friend ready

This project was created over the course of one week (~45 hours of work) using Unreal Engine 4 and one of the free paragon characters.

Music by TeknoAxe:
http://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

If you're interested in my other projects or wanna have a chat about games or game dev, hit me up on twitter:
